Text:
Just like your favourite first-person-shooter battle royale, but in AOE4!

Units outside of the circle will die when the countdown hits zero. While the countdown is active you can exit the circle to gather resources, acquire relics, or capture sacred sites. Playing as the Mongols isn't required but it's definitely recommended.

Source code available at: https://github.com/hashtonmartyn/MongolRoyale
The number of resources given to each player every minute
Each player gets 200 of each resource every minute
Each player gets 500 of each resource every minute

Just like your favourite first-person-shooter battle royale, but in AOE4!\n\nUnits outside of the circle will die when the countdown hits zero. While the countdown is active you can exit the circle to gather resources, acquire relics, or capture sacred sites. Playing as the Mongols isn't required but it's definitely recommended.
the circle countdown timer will be 60s shorter than the previous one but not shorter than one minute
If enabled, the circle countdown timer will be 60s shorter than the previous one but not shorter than one minute
Controls where the circle is spawned on the map
the circle's central point will start at the centre of the map and shift slightly as the game goes on
the circle's central point will always be the centre of the map
the circle's central point can be anywhere on the map
Ordered by least random to most random
